name: We Village
description:
We Village is a game about managing a group of people trying to survive in a disputed area between two countries. Each inhabitant has unique traits that will affect their effectiveness at given tasks. Rebuild the village, make sure the inhabitants survive and try to find a diplomatic solution before the conflict starts again.

Attributions Game uses free resources provided by Freepik & Flaticon (click for more information)
